title: UK Data Protection Bill
extract: The Data Protection Act updates our data protection laws for the digital age. It received Royal Assent on 23 May 2018. ... empowers people to take control of their data. supports UK businesses and organisations through the change.May 23, 2018
extract_html: The Data Protection Act updates our data protection laws for the digital age. It received Royal Assent on 23 May 2018. ... empowers people to take control of their data. supports UK businesses and organisations through the change.May 23, 2018
